I think from a user point of view it makes sense trying to create a child of
«Authoring». But that leads to an error:

Is it possible to disable the menu options for page creation when the 
Authoring-Node is active?

1) Choose Site Tab
2) Click on node «Authoring»
3) Choose new xhtml-Document
4) Choose either Child or Sibling
5) Submit
